product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Find-Me Light Sticks - Package of 2 - Special Buy
long_description: Giving off soft, glowing light, the Find-Me Light Sticks from Ultimate Survival Technologies can be used as signaling devices or to provide light around your campsite.
